title: Smith Icon MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: For little racers going mach schnell, the Smith Icon MIPS Helmet sits at the top of the podium. Its proven ABS construction is backed up with complete Koroyd® coverage for lightweight, energy-absorbing impact protection with excellent ventilation properties. And with seamless integration with Smith Goggles for maximum comfort and venting, it's clear - you gotta go with the Icon!

title: Smith Icon MIPS Helmet - Big Kids' - Used
description: For little racers going mach schnell, the Smith Icon MIPS Helmet sits at the top of the podium. Its proven ABS construction is backed up with complete Koroyd® coverage for lightweight, energy-absorbing impact protection with excellent ventilation properties. And with seamless integration with Smith Goggles for maximum comfort and venting, it's clear - you gotta go with the Icon!

title: Smith Survey Jr. MIPS Helmet - Kids'
description: Simplify the goggle process with the Smith Survey Jr. MIPS Helmet. By integrating a visor, all the stress of finding the perfect goggle and helmet combo vanishes. Plus, no more lost goggles. The visor features terrain-defining clarity of ChromaPop™ while the helmet combines top safety innovations like MIPS® and zonal Koroyd®. Make life on the mountain easier and safer with the Smith Survey MIPS Helmet.

title: Smith Survey Jr. MIPS Helmet - Kids' - Used
description: Simplify the goggle process with the Smith Survey Jr. MIPS Helmet. By integrating a visor, all the stress of finding the perfect goggle and helmet combo vanishes. Plus, no more lost goggles. The visor features terrain-defining clarity of ChromaPop™ while the helmet combines top safety innovations like MIPS® and zonal Koroyd®. Make life on the mountain easier and safer with the Smith Survey MIPS Helmet.

title: POC POCito Auric Cut SPIN Helmet - Kids'
description: Set your lil' shredder up for total success on the mountain with the extra-safe and easy to spot POC Pocito Auric Cut SPIN Helmet. Complete with POC's new slip-plane shearing pad technology, along with a burly multi-impact liner and an LED panel so you can spot 'em in low light, the Pocito Auric Cut SPIN is the next level of safety and peace of mind for you and your grom.

title: POC POCito Fornix MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Kids can go overboard sometimes — eyes bigger than their stomach, biting off more than they can chew, and sometimes, there's a bit more stoke in their riding than their skillset and growing bodies are ready to handle. The POC POCito Fornix MIPS Helmet construction and technical features help minimize consequences when the young guns go a bit too big. MIPS technology offers enhanced rotational protection during awkward falls, an upgraded adjustable fit system helps optimize safety and comfort, a NFC medical ID chip in the helmet keeps medical data stored to assist in emergencies, and RECCO is built-in to easily search if someone is lost on the mountain.

title: Giro Buzz MIPS Helmet - Little Kids'
description: Just when you thought your grom couldn't get any faster, they drop the lens on the Giro Buzz MIPS Helmet and zip off in a cloud of snow. The futuristic style of the Buzz takes a load off your shoulders, making misplaced goggles a thing of the past. And with MIPS technology and the In Form Fit System, all day comfort and protection are guaranteed.

title: Anon Windham WaveCel Helmet - Kids'
description: The Anon Windham WaveCel Helmet combines the reliable durability of a hardshell helmet with the lightweight, space-age goodness of WaveCel construction. By incorporating 3D-structured WaveCel into the protective EPS foam of the helmet, Anon is able to increase the helmet's effectiveness against direct and rotational impacts, all while reducing weight and aiding breathability. Last but not least, it's finished off with a magnetic buckle and a Polartec® grid fleece liner for a super high quality feel.

title: Smith Prospect Jr. MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: The Smith Prospect Jr. MIPS Helmet features the latest in protective technology PLUS the ability to adjust to a huge range of head sizes so your young ripper can keep the same helmet for many seasons. The Smith Grow With Me™ sizing system uses a dual stage liner strategy to accommodate the largest range of head sizes in the industry, and comes with both MIPS® rotational protection and Aerocore™ protection. Any one of these features is enough to warrant buying this helmet, but with the Prospect Jr. MIPS you get them all.

title: Smith Prospect Jr. MIPS Helmet - Big Kids' - Used
description: The Smith Prospect Jr. MIPS Helmet features the latest in protective technology PLUS the ability to adjust to a huge range of head sizes so your young ripper can keep the same helmet for many seasons. The Smith Grow With Me™ sizing system uses a dual stage liner strategy to accommodate the largest range of head sizes in the industry, and comes with both MIPS® rotational protection and Aerocore™ protection. Any one of these features is enough to warrant buying this helmet, but with the Prospect Jr. MIPS you get them all.

title: Smith Scout Jr. MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Hardshell durability and MIPS brain protection in one sweet package make the Smith Scout Jr. MIPS Helmet a tough combination to beat in a kids' helmet, and the comfort factor of the Scout Jr MIPS means they'll wear it without thinking about it - a good habit to get into.

title: Oakley MOD 1 MIPS Helmet - Big Boys'
description: The Oakley MOD 1 MIPS Helmet takes a freestyle inspired design and infuses it with Oakley DNA for a distinctive identity that is easy on the eyes and even easier on your head. Featuring a lightweight in-mold construction, MIPS slip-plane liner for additional rotational impact protection, and a secure 360° fit system, the MOD 1 makes it easy to dial in the perfect fit all while staying safe and looking good on the mountain.

title: Atomic Count Jr Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Designed with input from pros that span the ski genre spectrum, the Atomic Count Jr Helmet meets the needs of kids and their parents alike. Its inverted hybrid construction puts extra reinforcement along the sides and back, where 85% of impacts occur. The crown of the helmet remains lightweight, keeping the grams down overall. With a removable and washable liner, 360° Fit System, and plenty of ventilation, the Atomic Count Jr Helmet lets you relax as they charge it.

title: Atomic Count Jr Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Designed with input from pros that span the ski genre spectrum, the Atomic Count Jr Helmet meets the needs of kids and their parents alike. Its inverted hybrid construction puts extra reinforcement along the sides and back, where 85% of impacts occur. The crown of the helmet remains lightweight, keeping the grams down overall. With a removable and washable liner, 360° Fit System, and plenty of ventilation, the Atomic Count Jr Helmet lets you relax as they charge it.

title: Smith Glide Jr. MIPS Helmet - Kids'
description: Super lightweight and so comfy they'll not even notice it's on, the Smith Glide Jr. MIPS Helmet sets the standard for kids' lids. A combination of Smith's lightest in-mold construction paired with the MIPS® Brain Protection System is just right for getting started on the snow.

title: Giro Neo Jr MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: A new MIPS option for kids that mirrors the adult Neo styling, the Giro Neo Jr MIPS Helmet is well-vented, super adjustable, and offers category-leading protection for little heads.

title: Giro Neo Jr MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: A new MIPS option for kids that mirrors the adult Neo styling, the Giro Neo Jr MIPS Helmet is well-vented, super adjustable, and offers category-leading protection for little heads.

title: Giro Crue MIPS Helmet - Little Kids'
description: A sturdy hard shell design that will outlast several kids' youth careers, the Giro Crue MIPS Helmet is a clean freestyle design with the MIPS® protection system built in. That head has to last for a lifetime, so protect it when they're young with the outstanding Giro Crue Helmet.

title: Giro Spur MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: You're still able to keep in front of them, if only just barely. Soon they'll be laying first tracks whether you like it or not, and the Giro Spur MIPS Helmet will ease your worry as they blaze around that next corner, out of sight. With MIPS® and a great custom fit, your big kid will be protected and comfortable as they leave you in the dust. Thanks, that's what parents are for!

title: Oakley MOD 1 MIPS Helmet - Big Boys'
description: The Oakley MOD 1 MIPS Helmet takes a freestyle inspired design and infuses it with Oakley DNA for a distinctive identity that is easy on the eyes and even easier on your head. Featuring a lightweight in-mold construction, MIPS slip-plane liner for additional rotational impact protection, and a secure 360° fit system, the MOD 1 makes it easy to dial in the perfect fit all while staying safe and looking good on the mountain.

title: Oakley MOD 1 Helmet - Kids'
description: The Oakley MOD 1 Helmet takes a freestyle inspired design and infuses it with Oakley DNA for a distinctive identity that's easy to get down with. Featuring a lightweight in-mold construction and a secure 360° fit system, allowing you to find your perfect fit in a snap.

title: Anon Rime 3 Helmet - Kids' - Used
description: Our littlest noggins shouldn't have problems. So wrap them in ABS, the wee froth goblins. The Anon Rime 3 Helmet is a multi-season skate-inspired hard hat designed for today's juvenile omni-shredders. With a low profile, a comfortable fleece liner and removable earpads, and smooth magnetic buckle, it's well-designed and built to last. So they can go fast. And crash. And do the monster mash.

title: Smith Scout Jr. Helmet - Big Kids'
description: A kid's sized variant of the bomber multi-sport Scout helmet, the Smith Scout Jr. Helmet offers superb protection combined with kid-resistant durability. Plus, the styling is cutting edge and will help inspire groms to wear it. Get it all with the Scout Jr. and take their riding to the next level.

title: Sandbox Classic Ace 2.0 Helmet - Big Kids'
description: The Sandbox Classic Ace 2.0 Helmet gives you Sandbox's signature style with a youth-specific fit. This timelessly cool brimmed helmet has a tough ABS shell with an EPS liner that's CE certified for skiers and snowboarders alike. The Classic Ace 2.0 Helmet also features a removable liner, removable ear pads, and a removable goggle bumper to let the youngsters customize their look and fit.

title: Anon Burner Helmet - Big Kids'
description: With the protection you want and the style your grom wants, Anon makes the whole family happy with the Anon Burner Helmet. Its lightweight yet highly protective polycarbonate shell adheres to both ASTM 2040 and CE 1077B snowsports helmet certifications while still delivering style and comfort that your kid will WANT to wear!

title: Giro Neo Jr Helmet - Kids'
description: Send them onto the slopes with maximum piece of mind. The Giro Neo Jr Helmet is well-vented, easy to adjust, and offers reliable protection for little heads going way too fast in the slow zone.

title: Oakley MOD 1 Helmet - Kids'
description: The Oakley MOD 1 Helmet takes a freestyle inspired design and infuses it with Oakley DNA for a distinctive identity that's easy to get down with. Featuring a lightweight in-mold construction and a secure 360° fit system, allowing you to find your perfect fit in a snap.

title: Sandbox Icon Ace Helmet - Big Kids'
description: With all the same features as the adult version, the Sandbox Icon Ace Helmet gives kids the confidence and protection they need to thrive on snow. A soft-touche matte finish on the durable ABS shell provides a cool, yet timeless, look while the removable liner and ear pads let you customize the fit (wear it with or without a beanie). Get your grom ready to ride this season with the youth-sized Sandbox Icon Ace Helmet.

title: Smith Holt Jr. Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Whoa, what more could you ask for? The Smith Holt Jr. Helmet boasts bomber protection, simple design, and removable ear pads so you can use it at the mountain and as a bike or skate helmet in the off-season!

title: Scott Keeper 2 Plus Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Send your child out in the Scott Keeper 2 Plus Helmet and you'll be able to breathe a sigh of relief, safe in the knowledge that they're well protected in all circumstances. Combining tough Polycarbonate In-Mold construction with elevated MIPS® protection and an easy-to-use dial fit system, this helmet is built to handle the inevitable scrapes and keep on going.

title: Atomic Four Helmet - Kids'
description: Five out of five, that's the Atomic Four Helmet. This is a low-profile and very cool looking helmet that, like all Atomic helmets, exceeds safety certification requirements by at least 30%. That's the kind of pulse-slowing confidence parents can get behind! Not saying you should encourage an abandonment of speed checks in the family altogether, but it's nice to know the most important people in your life are well-protected. The Four Helmet has all the best features of adult helmets, sized down for your little ones' heads.

title: Salomon Grom Helmet - Big Kids'
description: The Salomon Grom Helmet keeps your lil' person protected from the inherent risks of skiing and snowboarding, giving them the comfort of full protection and enhanced confidence as they build their skills. A Custom Dial twists to find the precise fit of growing noggins, day in and day out, no matter how wild the ride. Built-in air channels keep young heads cool as they work to find their groove.

title: Giro Crue MIPS Helmet - Little Kids'
description: A sturdy hard shell design that will outlast several kids' youth careers, the Giro Crue MIPS Helmet is a clean freestyle design with the MIPS® protection system built in. That head has to last for a lifetime, so protect it when they're young with the outstanding Giro Crue Helmet.

title: Giro Spur MIPS Helmet - Big Kids'
description: You're still able to keep in front of them, if only just barely. Soon they'll be laying first tracks whether you like it or not, and the Giro Spur MIPS Helmet will ease your worry as they blaze around that next corner, out of sight. With MIPS® and a great custom fit, your big kid will be protected and comfortable as they leave you in the dust. Thanks, that's what parents are for!

title: Pret Moxie X Helmet - Big Kids'
description: For the fearless groms who know no limits, the Pret Moxie X Helmet has everything they need to stay comfy, safe, and secure. Along with loads of other features, the pull and release fit system makes adjusting the helmet size super easy, and the fixed ventilation keeps your pint-sized shredder comfortable all day long. Life on the hill is better for everyone when the kiddos are equipped to rip, so do so with the Pret Moxie X Helmet.

title: Smith Holt Jr. Helmet - Big Kids' - Used
description: Whoa, what more could you ask for? The Smith Holt Jr. Helmet boasts bomber protection, simple design, and removable ear pads so you can use it at the mountain and as a bike or skate helmet in the off-season!

title: Marker Squad Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Calling all youngsters to join the safety squad! The Marker Squad Helmet sports a modern look for aspiring shredders. The ABS hardshell technology with a lightweight EPS core mean this helmet is optimized for off-piste protection, reliability and durability. The FidLock chinstrap buckle snaps closed with no fiddling at all and the RTS size adjustment provides a comfortable and precise fit for all-day comfort.

title: Giro Launch MIPS Helmet - Little Kids'
description: The Giro Launch MIPS Helmet is light, cool and super safe. The first two attributes will make sure your kid actually wears it and the third will let you breathe easier when he or she actually puts the helmet to the test.

title: Marker Bino Helmet - Kids'
description: The Marker Bino Helmet features fun colors and designs to show kids that there's nothing more fun than being safe. The in-mold construction makes this helmet super light and strong while the RTS fit system provides a snug, comfortable feeling that cradles young noggins through all the dips and dives of learning to ski.

title: Anon Rime 3 Round Fit Helmet - Kids'
description: Keep them safe through every season with the Anon Rime 3 Round Contour Fit Helmet, an all season certified helmet with a skate inspired look. Easily removable ear pads offer an easy transition from cold weather to warm, while passive ventilation and a fleece lining help regulate their temperature and keep complaints to a minimum. The Rime 3 Round Contour Fit is specifically designed to fit those with rounder heads, so kids big and small can enjoy the snow, safely.

title: Anon Rime 3 Helmet - Kids'
description: Our littlest noggins shouldn't have problems. So wrap them in ABS, the wee froth goblins. The Anon Rime 3 Helmet is a multi-season skate-inspired hard hat designed for today's juvenile omni-shredders. With a low profile, a comfortable fleece liner and removable earpads, and smooth magnetic buckle, it's well-designed and built to last. So they can go fast. And crash. And do the monster mash.

title: Bern Bandito EPS MIPS Helmet - Kids' - Used
description: The Bern Bandito EPS MIPS Helmet delivers 4 season functionality to keep younger speed demons safe from their own exploits, no matter what they're getting into. Modeled after the bestselling Watts helmet, it's certified for biking and skating as well as winter activities, and can be modified with a host of Bern add ons.

title: Bern Bandito EPS MIPS Helmet - Kids'
description: The Bern Bandito EPS MIPS Helmet delivers 4 season functionality to keep younger speed demons safe from their own exploits, no matter what they're getting into. Modeled after the bestselling Watts helmet, it's certified for biking and skating as well as winter activities, and can be modified with a host of Bern add ons.

title: Pret Moxie X Helmet
description: The feature-rich Pret Moxie X Helmet keeps you as warm and comfy as you enjoy unparalleled safety in the snow. With MIPS and the Ripcord System fit, this helmet stays on until you decide to take it off, when it's removed more easily than a too-small earbud. For everyday comfort and ease of use, nobody beats Pret!

title: Smith Zoom Jr. Helmet - Big Kids'
description: Somehow it's those fidgety kids who can never sit still who turn into dynamos on the hill, but whoa Nelly do you worry about them getting hurt. Do what you can to protect their heads with the Smith Zoom Jr. Helmet, a lightweight but durable In-Mold design that you won't have to urge them to wear. With Smith's DFS2 dial fit system you can make the Zoom Jr. fit a few different heads, so handing this helmet down is also a possibility.

title: Anon Flash Helmet - Kids' - Used
description: We get it; all your kid wants to do is hit those big jumps and steel rails in the park 'til the sun goes down, and all you want is for them to get back to the lodge in one piece. The Anon Flash Helmet is here to strike a compromise and make everyone happy. Built with Endura-Shell ABS Construction, the Flash is designed for maximum protection and season after season durability, with a magnetic Fidlock® snap buckle to make putting it on a breeze; they'll able to fasten his helmet long before they ever learn to tie their own shoelaces.
